scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of an unpublished memoir, "The Last Good Fight," written by Hank Rubin, a veteran of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade. The memoir documents his life shortly before, during and after the Spanish Civil War.
